note.p: Granddaughter of Charlotte Finch and daughter of Commodore Charles Fielding and Sophia Fielding. Married the diplomat Lord Robert Stephen Fitzgerald (1765–1833) in 1792.
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 13 December 2017)
London, England, Church of England deaths and burials, 1813–2003 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 December 2017)
